titleStmt.title: A serious discourse between two lovers. This song will teach young men to woo, and shew young maidens what to do; nay it will learn them to be cunning too, to the tune of, When sol will cast no light, or, Deep in love. / J. Wade.
titleStmt.author: Wade, John, fl. 1660-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W[illiam]. Thackeray, T[homas]. Passenger, and W[illiam]. Whitwood.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
